about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: A modern learning platform built for students preparing for Software Engineering Interviews.

contentBlocks.text: We created this platform to provide the most structured, realistic, and industry-level preparation experience for students who dream of cracking top-tier tech interviews. Unlike scattered YouTube playlists or incomplete notes, our resources are research-backed, practical, and aligned with real company interviews.

items: Make high-quality tech education accessible to everyone
Provide interview-ready resources that match FAANG standards
Teach real System Design, DSA, LLD, and Computer Science fundamentals
Remove the confusion of 'what to study and how'

contentBlocks.text: Our content is designed after studying InterviewBit, GeeksforGeeks, and HelloInterviews — picking the best parts of all three platforms and refining them. We focus on clarity, structured sequencing, and deep explanations without overwhelming the learner.

items: Blog-Style Deep Dives on Architecture and Engineering

contentBlocks.text: Every topic you see on our website goes through a complete pipeline — research, analysis, real-world validation, and then a structured rewrite. This ensures our content is accurate, easy to understand, and interview-ready.

items: We study real architecture of apps like Instagram, Uber, Netflix
We validate every concept with engineering blogs & documentation
We write in small, understandable blocks
We prioritize visuals, diagrams, and easy breakdowns
We constantly update content based on new tech trends

contentBlocks.text: We are a small team of developers, educators, and designers who experienced the chaos of interview preparation firsthand. Our years working with system design, backend engineering, and product development shaped the platform you see today.
We believe great opportunities shouldn't depend on expensive coaching — they should depend on great guidance.
We are constantly evolving. In the coming months, we plan to introduce more advanced courses, mock interview experiences, and AI-driven personalization so every student gets a custom roadmap.
